org.soulwing.prospecto.runtime.context

Interface ScopedViewContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ViewContext

    public interface ScopedViewContext
extends ViewContext
    A ViewContext onto which additional scopes can be pushed and popped as node tree of a view template is traversed.
    Author:
    Carl Harris
